plugin.name: sayit
plugin.author: William Bowling (Mac), Arieh Schneier (Win), Karel Demeyer (Linux)
plugin.description: Speaks the messages you receive in the background. It will use the default voice set in the system preferences. If you enter a different voice (Mac), make sure you use a capital first letter. On linux you need festival text2speech, get it from http://www.cstr.ed.ac.uk/projects/festival/
